sys_script_include.name: AJAXGlideRecord

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1988963d4773a11026847688c26d4372
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_698230_my_custom.AJAXGlideRecord</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>AJAXGlideRecord</name><script><![CDATA[var AJAXGlideRecord = Class.create();
AJAXGlideRecord.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getRecord: function()
	{
		
		var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
		var query = this.getParameter('sysparm_query');

		if(!table || !query)
		        return; //-> if the table or query is missing do nothing
		
		var record = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
		record.addEncodedQuery(query);
		record.query();
		if(record.next())
			return JSON.stringify(record);
		
		return;
	},
	
	type: 'AJAXGlideRecord'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-03 19:40:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>1988963d4773a11026847688c26d4372</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AJAXGlideRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My custom App" source="x_698230_my_custom">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="My custom App">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1988963d4773a11026847688c26d4372</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-03 19:40:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
